summary: Two men decide to cash in on the end of Prohibition by selling watered down beer.
cast: Buster Keaton|Jimmy Durante|Roscoe Ates|Phyllis Barry|John Miljan|Henry Armetta|Edward Brophy|Charles Dunbar|Charles Giblyn|Sidney Bracey|Eddy Chandler|James Donlan|Billy Engle|Sherry Hall|Pat Harmon|George Irving|Al Jackson|Wilbur Mack|Broderick O'Farrell|Lee Phelps|Rolfe Sedan|Harry Tenbrook
title: Queremos cerveza
